content:
#29057 this is my first PR and I would be grateful for any feedback.

I needed this result and was surprised to see it didn't exist and wasn't trivial based on what was already implemented (unless I've missed something)
Can I bump this thread? What's the etiquette on bumping here?

Yes, bumping is generally fine, though do be aware that there are currently 400+ other PRs on the review queue. From a first glance it looks like it's in pretty good shape, so hopefully it will be approved once someone has time.
